title: Sea bass ceviche on corn husks with a palm heart salad
description: Peruvian food is gaining recognition in the UK and this recipe involves wrapping the marinated raw fish in corn-on-the-cob husks and combining it with some surprising South American ingredients.
ingredients: 4 sea bass fillets, cut into 2cm/¾in cubes
200g/7oz tinned palm hearts, drained and cut into 5mm/¼in slices
100g/3½oz fresh South American-style cheese or feta, cut into 1cm/½in cubes
salt and freshly ground black pepper
1 large bunch coriander, leaves finely chopped
